original: This character will owe you a §YFavor§!.
translation: 此人将会欠你一个§Y人情§!。

original: While passing judgement onto criminals from the safety of your throne, a young noble is brought before you. You quickly come to the conclusion that the man is indeed guilty. Condemning him might not be the wisest choice, as he is of noble birth. If you were to pardon the man he might prove himself useful to you, as he would be in your debt.
translation: 正当审判威胁你王座的罪犯时，一个年轻的贵族被带到你面前。你迅速得出了结论：这个人的的确有罪。向他问罪可能不是最明智的选择，毕竟他是个贵族出身。如果你赦免了这个人，他会证明他自己是对你有用处的，毕竟他欠了你罪债。

original: Release him! Now, do not forget what I did for you...
translation: 放了他！你可别忘了我为你所做的这一切……

original: Being of noble birth means nothing. To the dungeons with him!
translation: 贵族身份一文不值！跟他一起去地牢吧！

original: During a particularly heated argument in the council, [target_saved_voter.GetTitledFirstName] stepped in as you were about to make a fool out of yourself. [target_saved_voter.GetSheHeCap] was able to argue for your point, not only saving your face but also winning the argument for you! It is obvious that [target_saved_voter.GetFirstName]'s smooth talking was the sole reason for your success, and denying that fact would likely paint you in a bad light.
translation: 内阁争辩不休，正当你快要出丑时，[target_saved_voter.GetTitledFirstName]走进来了。[target_saved_voter.GetSheHeCap]不仅可以为你的观点争辩从而挽回你的颜面，而且还能为你赢得这场争论！显然[target_saved_voter.GetFirstName]的巧舌如簧是你成功的唯一原因，而否认这一点或许会使你声誉不佳。

original: Thank you! I do truly owe you in return!
Bah! I would have won that argument by myself!
translation: 我呸！我自己本来能赢得那场争论！

original: During a particularly heated argument in the council, you stepped in as [From.GetBestName] was making a fool of [From.GetHerselfHimself]. You managed to soothe the debaters and win the argument for [From.GetHerHim]. This turned out to be a great move on your part, as [From.GetSheHe] now feels indebted to you!
translation: 内阁争辩不休，正当[From.GetBestName]快要出丑时，你走了进来。在你帮助下[From.GetHerHim]赢了辩论。这是很好的手段，现在[From.GetSheHe] 欠你一份人情！

original: Now, when to call in the favor...
translation: 现在，何时去兑现人情呢……

original: During a particularly heated argument in the council, you stepped in as [From.GetBestName] was making a fool of [From.GetHerselfHimself]. You managed to soothe the debaters and win the argument for [From.GetHerHim]. Though this only infuriated [From.GetHerHim], as [From.GetSheHe] wanted to win the argument by [From.GetHerHis] own means! Throwing a tantrum like this has publicly shamed [From.GetFirstName].
translation: 内阁争辩不休，正当[From.GetBestName]快要出丑时，你走了进来。在你的帮助下[From.GetHerHim]赢了辩论。这激怒了[From.GetHerHim]，[From.GetSheHe]想依靠[From.GetHerHis]能力赢得辩论！这样等于公开羞辱[From.GetFirstName]。
忘恩负义是这个世界的奖励。

original: As the council meeting ends, [target_pious_voter.GetTitledFirstName] pulls you to the side. [target_pious_voter.GetSheHeCap] talks to you at length about the need to respect the authority of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] when making decisions in the council. Apparently the council is in agreement on you having neglected to do so, but fortunately [target_pious_voter.GetFirstName] offers to help you!
translation: 内阁讨论结束时，[target_pious_voter.GetTitledFirstName]把你拉到一边。[target_pious_voter.GetSheHeCap]跟你大谈特谈要尊重[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]在内阁中做决定的权威性。显然内阁对你的怠慢态度看法一致，但幸好[target_pious_voter.GetFirstName]愿意帮你！

original: You would do that for me? I am in your debt!
translation: 你真为会为我那样做吗？我欠你太多了！

original: No, there is no place for [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] in politics!

The council agreed that [From.GetBestName] had been acting in a very impious way, ignoring many wisdoms of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]. Being a pious [Root.GetManWoman] you decided to help [From.GetHerHim] not repeat the same mistakes. [From.GetFirstName] was very grateful for this help, and told you that [From.GetSheHe] was in your debt!
translation: 内阁一致认为[From.GetBestName]的行为非常不虔诚，无视了[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]的许多智训。作为一个虔诚的[Root.GetManWoman]，你决定防止[From.GetHerHim]重蹈覆辙。[From.GetFirstName]对你的帮助十分感激，并且说[From.GetSheHe]欠你许多！

original: Excellent, I can make use of this favor.
translation: 太好了！我可以用上这个人情了。

original: The council agreed that [From.GetBestName] had been acting in a very impious way, ignoring many wisdoms of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]. Being a pious [Root.GetManWoman] you decided to help [From.GetHerHim] not repeat the same mistake. Though, [From.GetFirstName] was infuriated by what [From.GetSheHe] assumed to be you trying to trick [From.GetHerHim]!
translation: 内阁一致认为[From.GetBestName]的行为非常不虔诚，无视了[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]的许多智训。作为一个虔诚的[Root.GetManWoman]，你决定防止[From.GetHerHim]重蹈覆辙。但[From.GetFirstName]被激怒了，因为[From.GetSheHe]以为你在试图诓骗[From.GetHerHim]！

original: Word has reached you of a [target_foreign_voter.GetJobTitle] in a foreign realm who is of masterful skill and handles [target_foreign_voter.GetHerHis] tasks with ease. Seeing as your own abilities are often doubted by the rest of the Council, perhaps you should write a letter to this '[target_foreign_voter.GetBestName]' and ask for [target_foreign_voter.GetHerHis] advice?
translation: 你听到传言说在国外有一位[target_foreign_voter.GetJobTitle]，有超凡才能并且处理[target_foreign_voter.GetHerHis]事务游刃有余。鉴于你本身的能力经常被同僚质疑，或许你该写封信给这位「[target_foreign_voter.GetBestName]」，向其寻求[target_foreign_voter.GetHerHis]建议？

original:
To the masterful [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
I am [From.GetTitledFirstName], [From.GetJobTitle] of [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].
Your skill as a [Root.GetJobTitle] on the Council of [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] is known far and wide. I implore you to advise me in matters of politics, so that I may serve my liege as admirably as you serve yours.

Regards,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
致超凡的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，
我是[From.GetTitledFirstName]，[From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的[From.GetJobTitle]。
作为[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]内阁中的[Root.GetJobTitle]，你的才能被深远流传。我恳求你给我一些政治方面的建议，使我可以像你一样令人钦佩地为我的领主效劳。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: A touching request, I will help you!
translation: 真是感人至深的请求，我会帮助你的！

original: Fraternizing with the enemy? I think not!
translation: 跟敌人称兄道弟？我看还是算了吧！

original:
To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetFirstName],

I agree to lend you advice on how to serve on the Council more effectively. Along with this letter I have enclosed a book which treatise my own experience as a [From.GetJobTitle], I hope its contents will serve you well!

Regards,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
致[GetFromRootCompliment][Root.GetFirstName]，

我愿意给你些建议，使你如何更有效的在内阁中效劳。随信附上一本书，讲述了我自己作为一位[From.GetJobTitle]的经验，希望里面的内容可以帮到你！

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
To the [GetFromRootInsult] [Root.GetFirstName],

Do you really think I would convey my secrets to you? You are a pathetic [From.GetJobTitle] and I do not see that changing soon!

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
致[GetFromRootInsult][Root.GetFirstName]，

你真的以为我会把我的秘诀告诉你？你这个可悲的[From.GetJobTitle]，我看你不会有长进了！

真诚的，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Why the...! [From.GetSheHeCap] dares to insult me when I ask for help?
translation: 什么……！[From.GetSheHeCap]怎敢在我寻求帮助时说出如此粗鄙之语？

original: Perhaps some money will change [From.GetHerHis] tone?
translation: 或许用点钱可以改变[From.GetHerHis]主意？

original:
To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetFirstName],

Know that I will never forget what you did for me! Please do not hesitate to ask if there is anything I can do for you, and know I will treat you like the dearest of friends.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
致[GetFromRootCompliment][Root.GetFirstName]，

要知道我永远不会忘记你为我所做的！如果有什么可以为你做的，请尽管开口。而且要知道，我会把你当最亲密的朋友。

真诚的，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

Know that I asked out of curiosity and not malice, but even so I apologize for what I did.
Sincerely,

[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
致 [Root.GetTitledFirstName]，

要知道我只是出于好奇心，并无恶意。但我还是要为我所做的致以歉意。
真诚的，

[From.GetTitledName]

original: Perhaps I was too harsh in my response...
translation: 或许我在回信中过于刻薄……

original:
To the [GetFromRootInsult] [Root.GetFirstName],

You dare to refuse me help? Know that I will not soon forget this insult to my honor.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
致[GetFromRootInsult][Root.GetFirstName]，

你竟敢拒绝帮我？要知道我可不会忘了你对我名誉的损坏。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetFirstName],

I excuse my forward request. Perhaps some gold would make you reconsider my offer?

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
致[GetFromRootCompliment][Root.GetFirstName]，

请原谅我提出的请求，或许来点金子会让你重新考虑一下我的提议？

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Well, when you put it like that!
No amount of gold will help your cause.

To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetFirstName],

I excuse my previous behavior! Along with this letter I have enclosed a book which treatise my own experience as a [From.GetJobTitle], I hope its contents will serve you well!

Regards,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
致[GetFromRootCompliment][Root.GetFirstName]，

请原谅我之前的行为！随信附上一本书，讲述了我自己作为一位[From.GetJobTitle]的经验，希望里面的内容可以帮到你！

致以最真挚的问候，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: I knew some gold would loosen [From.GetHerHis] tongue!
translation: 我就知道金子能撬开[From.GetHerHis]嘴！

original:
To the [GetFromRootInsult] [Root.GetFirstName],

Did you really think that I could be bought? Take your money back and leave me be, you will never partake of my secrets!

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
致[GetFromRootInsult][Root.GetFirstName]，

你真以为可以收买我？拿上你的脏钱别再来烦我，你永远都不会知晓我的秘诀！

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Your friend, [target_unlanded_friend.GetTitledFirstName], does not stand to inherit any land of [target_unlanded_friend.GetHerHis] own. You have always considered [target_unlanded_friend.GetHerHim] a [GetRootFromCompliment], and as such it would be a shame to see [target_unlanded_friend.GetHerHim] fade into irrelevance. If you were to offer [target_unlanded_friend.GetHerHim] the [target_friend_land.GetFullName] it would not only bring your friend closer, but you would also gain a vassal your entire family could trust!
translation: 你的朋友，[target_unlanded_friend.GetTitledFirstName]，没有准备继承[target_unlanded_friend.GetHerHis]任何土地。你一直把[target_unlanded_friend.GetHerHim]视作一个[GetRootFromCompliment]，而且看着[target_unlanded_friend.GetHerHim]日渐淡出人们视线真是个耻辱。如果你向[target_unlanded_friend.GetHerHim]提供[target_friend_land.GetFullName]，不仅可以让你的朋友关系更密切，还能赢得一个你全家族都可以信任的封臣！

original: Alas, [target_unlanded_friend.GetFirstName] was never meant to rule...
§Y[target_unlanded_friend.GetFirstName]'s§! opinion of all your §YDynasty Members§! changes by §G50§! §Y(Loyal Servant)§!\n
translation: §Y[target_unlanded_friend.GetFirstName]§!对你所有§Y家族成员§!的看法改变了§G50§!§Y（忠实的仆人）§!\n

original: §YThreat§! is a measure of how feared a Realm is. The higher this value is, the more likely nearby rulers might form a §YDefensive Pact§! to hinder further expansion. §YThreat§! increases when a Realm expands too quickly - the larger the Realm already is, the more §YThreat§! it will get. §YThreat§! decreases when a Realm shrinks, and it also decays over time. The stronger the realm is, the slower the decay will be.
translation: §Y威胁值§!是一个表示对某一领地畏惧程度的数值。这个值越高，附近的统治者就越可能签订§Y共同防御协定§!来阻碍其进一步扩张。领地向外扩张太快会增加§Y威胁值§!——领地面积越大，就会得到更多的§Y威胁值§!。当领地面积收缩，§Y威胁值§!也会降低，随着时间的推移而衰退。领地实力越强大，衰退就越慢。

original: Is not fighting as part of a Defensive Pact
translation: 作为防御性协议的一方，没有在战斗

original: Is not part of a Defensive Pact war opposing §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!
translation: 不是反§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!共同防御协定战争中的成员

original: This map mode shows any Defensive Pacts formed opposing the selected Realm.
translation: 该地图模式可以显示出针对所选国家的所有共同防御协定。

original: A Defensive Pact has been formed opposing this Realm
translation: 已签订针对这个国家的共同防御协定

original: Is Threatening enough to form a Defensive Pact against
translation: 形成足够的威胁从而签订一个共同防御协定来与之对抗
参与反$TARGETS|Y$的共同防御协定

original: Pacts such as Alliances, Non-aggression Pacts, and Defensive Pacts are shown here.
translation: 联盟、互不侵犯协议、共同防御协定等协议在这里显示。

original: This will remove me from the Defensive Pact opposing §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
translation: 这会把我从反§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!的共同防御协定中踢出。

original: This will remove §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! from the Defensive Pact opposing me.
translation: 这会把§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!从反我方的共同防御协定中踢出。
加入共同防御协定战争

original: $ALLY|Y$ has accepted a call to arms from $CALLER|Y$ opposing $TARGET|Y$. Due to a Defensive Pact, $ALLY|Y$ had no other choice.
translation: $ALLY|Y$已经接受$CALLER|Y$的反$TARGET|Y$军事召唤。由于共同防御协定，$ALLY|Y$别无选择。
签订共同防御协定对抗
加入现存的共同防御协定

original: A Defensive Pact is a group of characters uniting opposing a common enemy who has grown too big and become too much of a threat. If the target of the Defensive Pact attacks any member of the Pact, the members will unite in a war to stop their common enemy.
translation: 共同防御协定是一个联合的群体去对抗一个扩张过大以至于形成巨大威胁的公敌。如果共同防御协定针对的目标攻打任何一个签订协议的成员，所有成员将会在战争中联合以阻止他们的公敌。

original: Do you want to start a Defensive Pact opposing $TARGET|Y$?
translation: 你要开始一个反$TARGET|Y$的共同防御协定吗？

original: Do you want to leave the Defensive Pact opposing $TARGET|Y$?
translation: 你要撤出反$TARGET|Y$的共同防御协定吗？

original: Do you want to join the existing Defensive Pact opposing $TARGET|Y$?
translation: 你要加入现存的反$TARGET|Y$共同防御协定吗？

original: $TARGET|Y$ is opposed by a Defensive Pact that $MEMBER|Y$ is a member of.
translation: $TARGET|Y$是共同防御协定的针对目标，$MEMBER|Y$是协议中的一员。

original: $MEMBER|Y$ is a member of a Defensive Pact opposing $TARGET|Y$
translation: $MEMBER|Y$是反$TARGET|Y$的共同防御协定的一员

original: §Y$MEMBER$§! joined the existing Defensive Pact opposing §Y$TARGET$§!
translation: §Y$MEMBER$§!加入现存的反§Y$TARGET$§!共同防御协定

original: The Defensive Pact opposing §Y$TARGET$§! has been disbanded.
translation: 反§Y$TARGET$§!的共同防御协定已解散。

original: Is the target of a Defensive Pact with $NUM_MEMBERS|Y$ members in it.
translation: 是由$NUM_MEMBERS|Y$个成员组成的共同防御协定的目标

original: Is in a Defensive Pact opposing $TARGET|Y$ together with $NUM_MEMBERS|Y$ other members.
translation: 是与其他$NUM_MEMBERS|Y$个成员组成的反$TARGET|Y$的共同防御协定。

original: Cannot gain Threat since $CHARACTER|Y$ is not a ruler.
translation: 不能获得威胁值因为$CHARACTER|Y$不是统治者。

original: Grant Independence to §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W. [Recipient.GetSubjectPronounCap] will be duly grateful (§G+$OPINION$§! Opinion, §G$INFAMY$%§! Threat).
translation: 准许§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!独立。[Recipient.GetSubjectPronounCap]会非常感激（§G+$OPINION$§!好感，§G$INFAMY$%§! 威胁程度）。

original: Grant the §Y[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]§W and all titles under it to §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W, increasing [Recipient.GetPossPronoun] opinion of you by §G$OPINION$§! and lowering your Threat by §G$INFAMY$%§!.
translation: 把§Y[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]§!及其下属所有头衔授予§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!，这会让[Recipient.GetPossPronoun]对你的好感提高§G$OPINION$§!，并降低你 §G$INFAMY$%§!的威胁度。

original: Grant the §Y[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]§W to §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W, increasing [Recipient.GetPossPronoun] opinion of you by §G$OPINION$§! and lowering your threat by §G$INFAMY$%§!.
translation: 把§Y[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]§!授予给§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!，这会让 [Recipient.GetPossPronoun]对你的好感提高 §G$OPINION$§!，并降低你§G$INFAMY$%§!的威胁度。
国内即将执行强制和平

original: My Realm will soon be at Peace
translation: 我们国内马上会迎来和平

original: Being on your liege's council is not always easy. You have a huge amount of work that needs attention and there is so much to do. The list seems endless. Just as you are about to give up, [target_help_councillor.GetTitledFirstName] steps through the door and asks if you want any help. As tempting it may be, you would be in [target_help_councillor.GetHerHis] debt for it.
translation: 在你领主的内阁中任职并不一直是那么容易。相当大量的工作需要你去关注、需要你去做，看起来无休无止。就当你快要放弃时，[target_help_councillor.GetTitledFirstName]走进来询问你是否需要帮助。尽管这很诱人，但是这样做会让你为此欠下[target_help_councillor.GetHerHis]人情。

original: I suppose I could use some help...
translation: 我想我确实需要些帮助……

original: When casually strolling around the premises, as one often do, you come across [From.GetTitledFirstName] sitting at [From.GetHerHis] desk, overburdened with work. Seeing this as the perfect opportunity to help [From.GetHerHim] out and perhaps gain a favor in return, you offer a helping hand. [From.GetSheHeCap] looks at you with heavy eyes and after a moment, decides to accept your offer!
translation: 当你正如往常一样闲逛时，你看到[From.GetTitledFirstName]坐在[From.GetHerHis]房间里，进行着繁重的工作。你决定有偿的帮助[From.GetHerHim]完成工作，这会让他欠你一个人情。[From.GetSheHeCap]用沉重的眼神看了你一会儿后，决定接受你的提议！

original: I wasn't doing anything important anyway.
translation: 其实我没做什么重要的事情。

original: When casually strolling around the premises, as one often do, you come across [From.GetTitledFirstName] sitting at [From.GetHerHis] desk, overburdened with work. You see this as a great opportunity to help [From.GetHerHim] out and gain a favor in return. But to your surprise, [From.GetSheHe] not only refuses your help but has the nerve to insult you for it!
translation: 当你正如往常一样闲逛时，你看到[From.GetTitledFirstName]坐在[From.GetHerHis]房间里，进行着繁重的工作。你决定有偿的帮助[From.GetHerHim]完成工作，这会让他欠你一个人情。但令你惊讶的是，[From.GetSheHe]不仅拒绝了你的帮助还侮辱你！

original: Ha! Well good luck with that work of yours!
translation: 哈！那就祝您的工作一切顺利！

original: Every ruler needs to go out and meet the peasants in person from time to time. Just to make sure that they know you still exist if nothing else. As you visit the locals of [helping_vassal.Capital.GetName], you speak very frankly about what you think of them. Something that they took great offense in it seems. You look back to ensure that your guards are there to keep you out of harm's way, only to notice that they have all gone into the local tavern! Before you know it, the peasants begin to throw things at you!
translation: 每个统治者都需要时不时亲自外出接见农民们。没别的事，就是为了确保他们知道你还在。当你访问[helping_vassal.Capital.GetName]当地居民时，你非常真诚地表达了你对他们的看法。看起来，他们非常生气。你回头确认了一下你的卫兵是否还在保护你，却发现他们全都跑去了当地酒馆！在你反应过来之前，那些农民开始扔东西砸你！

original: I could run to [helping_vassal.GetTitledFirstName] and hide there!
Maybe I can just outrun them?
translation: 也许我能从他们手中逃脱？

original: Run for safety at the nearby residence of [helping_vassal.GetTitledFirstName] and hope that [helping_vassal.GetSheHe] will help.
translation: 跑向附近[helping_vassal.GetTitledFirstName]的住处，希望[helping_vassal.GetSheHe]能提供帮助。

original: You are calmly minding your own business, when you suddenly hear an awful ruckus outside. You open the door to see [From.GetTitledFirstName] running towards you with a mob of angry peasants at [From.GetHerHis] heels! If you would offer [From.GetHerHim] a place to hide, [From.GetSheHe] would truly be in your debt.
translation: 当你平静地思考人生时，你突然听见外面有可怕的喧嚣。你打开了门，看到了[From.GetTitledFirstName]向你跑来，而[From.GetHerHis]身后跟着一大群愤怒的农民！如果你能够给[From.GetHerHim]提供一个躲避的地方，[From.GetSheHe]会欠下你一个人情。

original: I'm not getting involved in this!
translation: 我才不要被卷入这种麻烦！

original: As you get closer you can see [From.GetTitledFirstName] standing in a doorway waving at you! You hurry towards [From.GetHerHim] and once inside, [From.GetFirstName] quickly closes the door. Safe at last. Who would ever have thought that peasants would be so easily insulted?
translation: 当你跑近时，你看到[From.GetTitledFirstName]站在门口向你挥手！你奔向了[From.GetHerHim]并马上进了屋。[From.GetFirstName]迅速关上了门。终于安全了。谁能想到那些农民会这么容易被激怒啊！

original: Thank you! I owe you one.

Running as fast as you possibly could, you see [From.GetTitledFirstName] standing in a doorway. But instead of offering you a safe place to hide, [From.GetSheHe] quickly closes the door right in front of you! Leaving you to fend for yourself!
translation: 你尽可能地飞奔，看到[From.GetTitledFirstName]正站在门口。但[From.GetSheHe]没有给你提供一个庇护所，而是迅速地在你面前关上了大门！你只能自救了！

original: By sending more equipment to the Mercenary Company, they will be able to equip lighter units to become heavier units and change its composition.
translation: 通过向佣兵团提供装备，他们会把轻型单位武装成重型单位。这会改变佣兵团的兵力构成。

original: By paying for more troops for the Mercenary Company you can increase its size.
translation: 通过向佣兵团提供更多部队，你可以扩大它的规模。

original: I can send equipment of higher quality to the troops of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] in order to change its troop composition and make them perform better in combat.
translation: 我可以给[From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]送一些高品质的装备以改变它的兵力构成，这会使他们在战斗中表现得更好。

original: I have the possibility to send troops to [From.GetFirstName] and his [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] to reinforce them.
translation: 我可能给[From.GetFirstName]和他的[From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]提供兵力来强化他们。

original: While being in your service, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has been speaking to you about his employer, [merc_band_employer.GetTitledFirstName]. So far you have only heard good things about [merc_band_employer.GetHerHim] and it has made you intrigued. Perhaps one should try to establish contact and offer a pact or a meeting?
translation: 当[From.GetTitledFirstName]为你效劳时，他一直在对你说他的雇主，[merc_band_employer.GetTitledFirstName]。至今为止，你只听到了关于[merc_band_employer.GetHerHim]的正面评价，这使你非常好奇。也许应该联系一下这位雇主，建立一个协定或者只是会上一面？

original: I shall write a letter at once!
This person is of no interest to me.

To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetFirstName],

Your servant [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has been speaking a great deal about you and your virtues. I would be delighted to meet you face to face and as such, I invite you to a grand feast to be held in your name.

[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
致[GetFromRootCompliment][Root.GetFirstName]，

您的仆人 [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]对您的美德赞不绝口。我想请您参加一场特邀宴会，如果您能来和我见一面，我将会非常高兴。

[From.GetTitledName]

original: I have no interest in such an arrangement.

To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetFirstName],

I received your letter and read it with much joy. I would love to attend your feast, and will make preparations to depart shortly.

[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
致[GetFromRootCompliment][Root.GetFirstName]，

很高兴收到您的来信！我非常愿意参加您的宴会。容我稍作准备，我很快就出发。

[From.GetTitledName]

original:
To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetFirstName],

I appreciate your letter and the effort you put into it. Unfortunately, I am afraid that I am unable to attend at this time.

[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
致[GetFromRootCompliment][Root.GetFirstName]，

很感谢您的来信，我收到了您的心意。但是非常遗憾，我恐怕这次不能来参加您的宴会。

[From.GetTitledName]

original: When [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] arrived, you welcomed [FromFrom.GetHerHim] with great splendor and expressed your happiness of having [FromFrom.GetHerHim] there. The two of you ate and spoke at great length about all sorts of things. When it was time for [FromFrom.GetFirstName] to leave, you had not only decided on a non-aggression pact, but could also depart as friends!
translation: 当[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]到达时，你热烈地欢迎了[FromFrom.GetHerHim]，并表达了你能邀请到[FromFrom.GetHerHim]的喜悦之情。你们两人一同进餐，聊起了各种各样的话题。当[FromFrom.GetFirstName]离开时，你们不仅达成了一个互不侵犯的联盟，还成为了朋友！

original: Let us do this again sometime!

When you arrived, [From.GetTitledFirstName] was there to welcome you in the most grandeur of ways. [From.GetSheHe] showed you inside, where you ate and spoke at great length and had a great time together. Both of you decided on a non-aggression pact and could also depart as friends!
translation: 当你到达时，[From.GetTitledFirstName]用最热烈的方式迎接了你。[From.GetSheHe]把你领进了室内，你们一同进餐、谈笑风生，度过了相当美好的时光。你们二人不仅建立了互不侵犯联盟，还成为了朋友！

original: I was glad to have accepted your invitation!

translation: 允许内阁针对继承法投票
不允许内阁针对继承法投票

original: Shattered armies ignores leaders attrition reduction
translation: 溃退中的军队不再受领导者损耗减少技能影响

original: Favor wasn't used to arrange the betrothal
translation: 婚约不是用人情建立的

original: This child is proud and vain, convinced of their own superiority. Can develop into: §YProud§!, §YArbitrary§! or §YCruel§!.
translation: 这个孩子骄傲、虚荣、自大。可能发展成：§Y骄傲§!、§Y专断§! 或 §Y残暴§!。

original: This child is kind and is quick to show love and affection. Can develop into: §YKind§!, §YContent§! or §YTrusting§!.
translation: 这个孩子和善、经常流露喜好。可能发展成：§Y和善§!、§Y安于现状§! 或 §Y值得信任§!。

original: This child is shy and quiet and usually avoids open conflicts. Can develop into: §YHumble§!, §YShy§! or §YCraven§!.
translation: 这个孩子害羞、安静、通常避免引起冲突。可能发展成：§Y谦卑§!、§Y害羞§! 或 §Y怯懦§!。

original: This child is stubborn and strong-willed, and doesn't obey or give way easily. Can develop into: §YAmbitious§!, §YBrave§! or §YStubborn§!.
translation: 这个孩子顽固、执拗，从不轻易遵从他人或作出让步。可能发展成：§Y野心勃勃§!、§Y勇敢§! 或 §Y顽固§!。

original: This child is a quiet thinker, often sitting inside in deep ponderings as others play outside in the sun. Can develop into: §YJust§!, §YWroth§! or §YEnvious§!.
translation: 这个孩子是一个安静的思考者。别的孩子白天在外玩时，这个孩子经常坐在屋内沉思。可能发展成：§Y正直§!、§Y易怒§! 或 §Y嫉妒§!。

original: This child is very averse to any kind of exertion, be it mental or physical. Can develop into: §YCharitable§!, §YSlothful§! or §YGluttonous§!.
translation: 这个孩子反感任何形式的努力，无论是精神上的还是身体上的。可能发展成§Y慷慨§!、§Y懒惰§! 或 §Y暴食§!。

original: This child loves to engage in fun and games, almost always turning any activity into an excuse to play. Can develop into: §YGregarious§!, §YDeceitful§! or (rarely) §YLunatic§!.
translation: 这个孩子喜欢沉浸在娱乐和游戏中，总是能找到去玩耍的借口。可能发展成：§Y合群§!、§Y狡诈§! 或  §Y精神错乱§!（稀少）。

original: This child is unusually scrupulous and responsible, taking delight in completing any chores and tasks to perfection. Can develop into: §YDiligent§! or §YTemperate§!.
translation: 这个孩子异乎寻常地细心、负责，乐于把繁琐的杂活、任务做得完美。可能发展成：§Y勤奋§!或§Y温和§!。

original: This child is very particular about details which seem trivial to others, sometimes to the point of causing anxiety and frustration. Can develop into: §YPatient§!, §YGreedy§! or §YParanoid§!.
translation: 这个孩子很讲究其他人觉得琐碎的细节，有时会因此沮丧、遭遇挫折。可能发展成：§Y耐心§!、§Y贪婪§! 或 §Y多疑§!。

original: This child has an inquisitive nature and is constantly asking questions and poking around looking for new and interesting things. Can develop into: §YShrewd§!, §YCynical§! or §Ysympathies for other religions§!.
translation: 这个孩子有着好奇的天性，不断地提问题、探索新奇事物。可能发展成：§Y精明§!、§Y愤世嫉俗§! 或 §Y同情其他宗教§!。

original: This child is easily impressed and also has a fervent desire to seek for ultimate truths. Can develop into: §YZealous§!, §YErudite§! or §YFrail§!.
translation: 这个孩子容易被感情影响，有着强烈的探求真理的欲望。可能发展成：§Y狂热§!、§Y博学§! 或 §Y脆弱§!

original: [Root.GetTitledName] raised a rune stone as a reminder that the demonic lord Xuhmalz of the Realm of Zulmarakh will return in the next millennia to bring destruction and chaos upon this pitiful world.
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]树立起一块符石，警示魔界葅偻魔偻岢的邪魔大君魖葅魔偻孳会在千年之后，将破坏和混乱带回到这个可怜的世界。
[Root.GetTitledName]在[Root.Location.GetName]举办了一场盛大的捏儿格。

original: To the [GetFromRootInsult] [Root.GetTitledFirstName].\n\nMy men and I have put up with your leeching of our abilities for too long now. You failed to treat us with the proper respect on multiple occasions and therefore we will from now on pay no respect or allegiance towards you. It will be my pleasure to aid your enemies to defeat your armies on the battlefield.
translation: 致[GetFromRootInsult][Root.GetTitledFirstName]。\n\n我和我的部下们已经忍受你残酷的剥削很久了。你无数次不给予我们应得的尊重，因此我们将不再遵守与你的协议。我很高兴能帮助你的敌人，在战场上打败你的军队。

original: \nDisables the Advisor minor titles for Kings and Emperors\n
translation: \n在王国、帝国禁用荣誉头衔「顾问」\n

original: \nEnables the Advisor minor titles for Kings and Emperors.\n
translation: \n在王国、帝国可以授予荣誉头衔「顾问」\n

original: No, I had something else in mind.
Call in a §YFavor§! to remove any reason to banish, execute, imprison or revoke titles your liege may have.
translation: 以§Y人情§!为交换，使你的领主可能拥有的驱逐、处决、逮捕或剥夺头衔的借口失效。

original: The crooked [pardon_target.GetBestName] has called in the Favor you owe [pardon_target.GetHerHim] in order to force you to pardon [pardon_target.GetHerHis] devious crimes! You will no longer be able to take hostile actions against [pardon_target.GetHerHim] without looking like a tyrant in the eyes of the realm.
translation: 阴险的[pardon_target.GetBestName]以你欠[pardon_target.GetHerHim]的人情为理由，强迫你原谅[pardon_target.GetHerHis]见不得人的罪恶！你不再可以对[pardon_target.GetHerHim]实施敌对行为，除非你想被全国当成暴君。

original:
You are a tyrant and a [GetFromRootInsult]! We will no longer stand idly by as you ignore the Council and the well-being of your subjects. The time has come for you to abdicate in favor of [new_title_holder.GetFullName]! Submit to this demand peacefully or face the consequences.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
你是暴君，是[GetFromRootInsult]！你一直无视内阁、无视你臣民的福祉，我们将不再袖手旁观。是时候让你让位给 [new_title_holder.GetFullName]了！和平接受这个提议，不然就让你尝点苦头。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
Rather than risking civil war tearing the realm apart, I have decided to give in to your demand and abdicate the throne. But this treacherous act of blackmail will not be forgotten...

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
为了避免内战分裂国土的危险，我决定同意你的请求并放弃王位。但是我永远不会忘记这种背信弃义的讹诈行为……

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Present an ultimatum to §Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!, demanding that [Root.Liege.GetSheHe] abdicates in favor of the most liked vassal in the realm. If [Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun] refuses to comply, your Faction will rise in revolt.
translation: 向§Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!发出最后通牒，要求[Root.Liege.GetSheHe]让位给境内最受欢迎的封臣。如果[Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun]拒绝遵从，你的派系将会发起反叛。

original: Apparently [FromFromFrom.GetBestName] has a reputation for not giving in to flirting. Any more time spent chasing [FromFromFrom.GetHerHim] is a waste.
translation: 显然[FromFromFrom.GetBestName]不喜调情的性格声名远播。花再多时间去追求[FromFromFrom.GetHerHim]也是浪费。

original: The response from [From.GetBestName] wasn't quite what I expected, apparently I am to 'stay away forever'.
translation: [From.GetBestName]的答复跟我期望的完全不一样，显然我只能「永远地离开」。

original: I am humbled by the responsibility given to me today. I accept the title of [new_title_holder.GetTitle] to serve you every way that I can. Your efforts to make a change will be remembered.\n\n[new_title_holder.GetTitledName]
translation: 我很谦恭地接下您今天给我的重任。我接受[new_title_holder.GetTitle]这个头衔，并将尽我所能效忠于您。您作出改变的壮举会被铭记。\n\n[new_title_holder.GetTitledName]

original: The faction led by [From.GetBestName] won their war and have chosen me as successor to the title of [Root.GetTitle]. In the future I am expected to show generosity towards anyone who helped make this happen.
translation: [From.GetBestName]领导的派系赢得了他们的战争，并钦点我来当[Root.GetTitle]的继承人。将来我会向帮助我的所有人展现我的宽宏慷慨。

original: This affects the stability of the Council!\n
I do not want you to weaken your Dynasty!\n
translation: 我不想让你使你的家族衰弱！\n

original: I do not want you to weaken Powerful vassals!\n
There is no glory in this, the character is a defenseless child!\n
translation: 太不光彩了，这可是一个手无寸铁的孩子！\n

original: I do not want you to grant land to your Dynasty!\n
translation: 我不想让你把土地授予给你的家族！\n

original: We're already busy fighting another war\n
translation: 我们已经忙于另一场战争了\n

original: We are not occupied with another war\n
translation: 我们没有被另一场战争缠住\n

original: There is an ongoing [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] that I want us to focus on\n
The target is pious and of my religion\n
translation: 战争目标很虔诚，并且是我的同宗\n

original: You are vastly over your Demesne Limit and are handing out a Barony or a County\n
translation: 你严重超出了直辖上限，应该分出一个男爵领或伯爵领\n

original: As [From.GetSheHe] is growing older, I can see that [From.GetFirstName] could use some guidance in some of my experienced areas. It will require hard work and may not always be appreciated but this is my chance to make a self-sacrifice for the sake of [From.GetFirstName].
translation: [From.GetSheHe]在逐渐长大，我觉得可以在擅长的领域内对[From.GetFirstName]进行一些指导。这可能费力不讨好，但这是为了[From.GetFirstName]的利益作出一些自我牺牲的机会。

original: As [From.GetSheHe] is growing older, I can see that [From.GetFirstName] could use some guidance in one of my experienced areas, diplomacy. This is my chance to make an effort for the sake of [From.GetHerHis] education but what can I offer?
translation: [From.GetSheHe]在逐渐长大，我觉得可以在外交领域内对[From.GetFirstName]进行一些指导，为了[From.GetHerHis]教育，我能提供什么？

original: As [From.GetSheHe] is growing older, I can see that [From.GetFirstName] could use some guidance in one of my experienced areas, the art of war. This is my chance to make an effort for the sake of [From.GetHerHis] education but what can I offer?
translation: [From.GetSheHe]在逐渐长大，我觉得可以在军事领域内对[From.GetFirstName]进行一些指导，为了[From.GetHerHis]教育，我能提供什么？

original: As [From.GetSheHe] is growing older, I can see that [From.GetFirstName] could use some guidance in one of my experienced areas, stewardship. This is my chance to make an effort for the sake of [From.GetHerHis] education but what can I offer?
translation: [From.GetSheHe]在逐渐长大，我觉得可以在管理领域内对[From.GetFirstName]进行一些指导，为了[From.GetHerHis]教育，我能提供什么？

original: As [From.GetSheHe] is growing older, I can see that [From.GetFirstName] could use some guidance in one of my experienced areas, intrigue. This is my chance to make an effort for the sake of [From.GetHerHis] education but what can I offer?
translation: [From.GetSheHe]在逐渐长大，我觉得可以在阴谋领域内对[From.GetFirstName]进行一些指导，为了[From.GetHerHis]教育，我能提供什么？

original: As [From.GetSheHe] is growing older, I can see that [From.GetFirstName] could use some guidance in one of my experienced areas, learning. This is my chance to make an effort for the sake of [From.GetHerHis] education but what can I offer?
translation: [From.GetSheHe]在逐渐长大，我觉得可以在学识领域内对[From.GetFirstName]进行一些指导，为了[From.GetHerHis]教育，我能提供什么？

original: It is clear to you that [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s commanders are nothing more than rabble - all brawn and no finesse. You, on the other hand, are an experienced tactician and a great teacher to boot! Perhaps you should offer to train [Root.Liege.GetFirstName]'s commanders in the hopes of gaining [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] favor?
translation: 很显然，[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的指挥官们有就是一群莽夫，不比暴民强到哪去。另一方面，你恰恰是一个出色的战术家，也是一个好老师！也许你应该提出训练[Root.Liege.GetFirstName]的指挥官们，以换取[Root.Liege.GetHerHis]一份人情？

original: I shall send [Root.Liege.GetHerHim] a letter offering my services!
translation: 我马上给[Root.Liege.GetHerHim]写封信以提议！

original:
To my liege, the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetFirstName],
It has not escaped me that several of your commanders lack formal training in military tactics. I would like to offer my services by training [commander_one.GetFirstName], [commander_two.GetFirstName] and [commander_three.GetFirstName] in the use of advanced battlefield stratagems!

Regards,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
致我的领主，[GetFromRootCompliment][Root.GetFirstName]，
我有个念头挥之不去。您的指挥官们缺少一些正规的战术训练。我提议由我来教给[commander_one.GetFirstName]、[commander_two.GetFirstName]和[commander_three.GetFirstName]一些优秀的战场策略！

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: A most generous offer, for this I will owe [From.GetHerHim]!
translation: 这是一个非常慷慨的提议，我会因此欠下[From.GetHerHim]一份人情！

original: No! [From.GetSheHeCap] is just trying to gain leverage on me!
translation: 不！[From.GetSheHeCap]只是想要占我的便宜！

original:
To my loyal subject, the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetFirstName],

Your offer is most generous! I graciously accept your offer and will remember this good deed in the future.

Regards,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
致我忠诚的臣子，[GetFromRootCompliment][Root.GetFirstName]，

您的提议非常慷慨！我欣然接受您的提议，在将来我会记住您这份功绩。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Excellent! Now I have leverage on [From.GetHerHim]...
translation: 棒极了！现在我可以利用[From.GetHerHim]了……

original:
To my subject, the [GetFromRootInsult] [Root.GetFirstName],

Your offer is obviously nothing but thinly-veiled deception. That you would even suggest that my commanders are anything but the very best is an insult!

Regards,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
致我的臣子，[GetFromRootInsult][Root.GetFirstName]，

你的提议是赤裸裸的欺诈。你竟然认为我的指挥官们不称职！这是对他们的无耻污蔑。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: This was not what I meant to happen!

translation: 保持诚实，如果可以的话。

original: Knowledge is power others don't need.
translation: 知识就是别人不需要的力量。

original: Others may try to trick you.
Knowledge is power, always learn more.
translation: 知识就是力量，学习永不止步。

original: Be thorough, make others count on you.
translation: 为人周密，使他人依靠你。

original: Make your move at the right time.
Increases the opinion of §Y[Root.GetFullName]'s§! adult child towards [Root.GetHerHim] by §G15§! for §Y240 months§!!\n
translation: §Y[Root.GetFullName]§!的成年孩子对[Root.GetHerHim]的好感增加§G15§!，持续§Y240个月§!！\n

original: As your heir is soon of age you can choose to formally introduce [Root.GetHerHim] to the vassals of the realm. This can help build trust that will certainly prove useful for the child in the future.
translation: 你的继承人就要成年了，把[Root.GetHerHim]引见给你辖下的封臣们。这可以帮助他们建立信任，将来会大有帮助。

original: You have invited your vassals to partake in a formal introduction of your heir, [introduced_heir.GetTitledFirstName]. [introduced_heir.GetSheHeCap] will have to exchange many pleasantries and act in a very formal way, something that might be tiresome for someone as young as [introduced_heir.GetHerHim]. However, you have full confidence that [introduced_heir.GetSheHe] will not disappoint you!
translation: 你邀请你的封臣前来，为他们介绍你的继承人，[introduced_heir.GetTitledFirstName]。[introduced_heir.GetSheHeCap]不得不和许多人寒暄交谈，留意举止是否得体。年轻的[introduced_heir.GetHerHim]可能不太喜欢这样的场合。但是，你相信[introduced_heir.GetSheHe]不会让你失望！

original: The last of your vassals have left and [introduced_heir.GetTitledFirstName] looks relieved. [introduced_heir.GetSheHeCap] is obviously exhausted from all the formalities, but having been introduced like this will hopefully serve [introduced_heir.GetHerHim] well in the future!
translation: 你的最后一个封臣离开了，看起来[introduced_heir.GetTitledFirstName]终于解脱了。显然[introduced_heir.GetSheHeCap]因拘谨礼节而筋疲力尽，但是希望一个个向封臣引见[introduced_heir.GetHerHim]能够对将来有帮助！

original: I've done my best to groom [introduced_heir.GetHerHim] into a worthy heir.
translation: 我已经尽全力去把 [introduced_heir.GetHerHim] 培养成一个合格的继承人了。

original: [vassal_teacher.GetBestName] is a renowned godly and learned vassal of yours. After having introduced [vassal_teacher.GetHerselfHimself] to [introduced_heir.GetFirstName], [vassal_teacher.GetFirstName] approaches you with an offer. [vassal_teacher.GetFirstName] is willing to spend some time teaching [introduced_heir.GetFirstName] some of the more intricate parts of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] in exchange for your favor.
translation: [vassal_teacher.GetBestName]在你的封臣里以博学多才赫赫有名。在给[introduced_heir.GetFirstName]自我介绍之后，[vassal_teacher.GetFirstName]向你提出建议。[vassal_teacher.GetFirstName]愿意花一段时间教给[introduced_heir.GetFirstName]一些关于[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]更加深奥的部分，这会使你欠下人情。

original: There is no need for that.

As [introduced_heir.GetFirstName] introduces [introduced_heir.GetHerselfHimself] to [compliment_vassal.GetBestName] [introduced_heir.GetSheHe] not only presents [introduced_heir.GetHerselfHimself] with grace, but also manages to impress [compliment_vassal.GetFirstName] by skillfully complimenting [compliment_vassal.GetHerHim]!
translation: 当[introduced_heir.GetFirstName]介绍[introduced_heir.GetHerselfHimself]给[compliment_vassal.GetBestName]的时候[introduced_heir.GetSheHe]不止优雅地介绍了[introduced_heir.GetHerselfHimself]，也成功地令[compliment_vassal.GetFirstName]印象深刻，通过有技巧地向 [compliment_vassal.GetHerHim]拍马屁！

original: As [introduced_heir.GetFirstName] introduces [introduced_heir.GetHerselfHimself] to [insult_vassal.GetBestName] [introduced_heir.GetSheHe] not only accidently spills a beverage on [insult_vassal.GetFirstName]'s shoes, but also manages to insult ALL of [insult_vassal.GetFirstName]'s ancestors!
translation: 当[introduced_heir.GetFirstName]介绍[introduced_heir.GetHerselfHimself]给[insult_vassal.GetBestName]的时候[introduced_heir.GetSheHe]不仅不小心把饮料撒到[insult_vassal.GetFirstName]的鞋子上，还冒犯了[insult_vassal.GetFirstName]所有的祖先！

original: It seems as if [introduced_heir.GetFirstName] has started getting along incredibly well with the child of one of the visiting vassals! Indeed, apparently [introduced_heir.GetFirstName] and [befriended_child.GetBestName] are becoming fast friends.
translation: 看上去好像[introduced_heir.GetFirstName]跟一个来访封臣的小孩相处的非常融洽！很显然[introduced_heir.GetFirstName]和[befriended_child.GetBestName]很快成了好朋友。

original: While having a pleasant conversation you are suddenly interrupted by an infernal ruckus, upon further investigation it seems as if [introduced_heir.GetFirstName] has gotten into a fight with the child of one of the visiting vassals! You tear the two children apart, but it is obvious that [introduced_heir.GetFirstName] and [rival_child.GetBestName] will not ever be friends after this encounter...
translation: 你正在惬意地与人交谈，忽然被一阵鬼哭狼嚎所打断，打探一下发现好像是[introduced_heir.GetFirstName]跟一位来访封臣的小孩打起来了！你把两个小孩分开，但很显然[introduced_heir.GetFirstName]跟[rival_child.GetBestName]在这次遭遇之后再也不可能成为朋友了……

original: As the hours go by you notice [introduced_heir.GetFirstName]'s mood starting to drop. [introduced_heir.GetSheHeCap] is obviously trying [introduced_heir.GetHerHis] best to impress the visiting vassals, but it is evidently tearing at [introduced_heir.GetHerHim]. Hopefully this slump in [introduced_heir.GetFirstName]'s mood will pass soon.
translation: 几个小时过去了 你发现[introduced_heir.GetFirstName]的心情非常低落。[introduced_heir.GetSheHeCap]很明显努力想要尽[introduced_heir.GetHerHis]最大努力来打动访问的封臣，但很明显这让[introduced_heir.GetHerHim]精疲力竭。希望[introduced_heir.GetFirstName]的低落情绪早点儿过去。

original: Now, there are still more vassals to greet...
translation: 接下来还有更多的封臣要接待……

original: [vassal_teacher_martial.GetBestName] is a renowned fighter and tactician. After having introduced [vassal_teacher_martial.GetHerselfHimself] to [introduced_heir.GetFirstName], [vassal_teacher_martial.GetFirstName] approaches you with an offer. [vassal_teacher_martial.GetFirstName] is willing to spend some time teaching [introduced_heir.GetFirstName] how to fight in exchange for your favor.
translation: [vassal_teacher_martial.GetBestName]是一位赫赫有名的战士和战术大师。在介绍[vassal_teacher_martial.GetHerselfHimself]给[introduced_heir.GetFirstName]之后，[vassal_teacher_martial.GetFirstName]接近你，并跟你提议：[vassal_teacher_martial.GetFirstName]愿意花一段时间教[introduced_heir.GetFirstName]如何与人搏斗，换取你的人情。

original: That would be useful, I will bestow my favor upon you!
translation: 这会很有用，我当然愿意欠你这个人情！

original: Learn how to fight? There is no need for such nonsense!
translation: 学习怎么打架？学这个有什么用！

original: It is evidently clear to all of the visiting vassals that [introduced_heir.GetTitledFirstName] has been infatuated with [husband_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s wife, [wife_target.GetTitledFirstName]. While harmless, [introduced_heir.GetFirstName] is still following her around like a dog. [husband_target.GetFirstName] does not seem to be amused.
translation: 所有来访的封臣都察觉到[introduced_heir.GetTitledFirstName]非常痴迷于[husband_target.GetTitledFirstName]的妻子，[wife_target.GetTitledFirstName]。虽然没有过分的接触，[introduced_heir.GetFirstName]还是整天像狗一样地跟着她。[husband_target.GetFirstName]看起来很不高兴。

original: There is no time for this nonsense!

translation: 内阁对战争的投票结果

original: Request to stop Enforce Peace accepted
translation: 要求停止执行强制和平被接受

original: Request to stop Enforce Peace denied
translation: 要求停止执行强制和平被否决
执行强制和平的要求被接受

original: The Council's authority in regards to the right of holding office and voting for succession.
translation: 内阁关于维持自身职位和选择领主继承人的权力

original: The ruler has full authority over choice of succession law and can fire council members at will.\n
translation: 领主拥有选择继承法的至高权力，并可凭借自己的意愿更换内阁成员。\n

original: The Council's authority reaches its peak, with the ruler unable to fire council members at will and unable to completely control the succession of the realm.\n
translation: 内阁的权利膨胀到了极限，领主无法随心所欲地替换内阁成员，而且无法完全控制领地内的继承法。\n

original: §YPowerful Vassals§! cannot be fired from the §YCouncil§!\nEnables the §YElective Monarchy§! law for Indian and Muslim religions\nCan no longer change succession if §YElective Monarchy§! is instituted
translation: §Y强力的封臣§!无法从§Y内阁§!被开除\n§Y选举君主制§!对印度宗教和穆斯林可用\n如果§Y选举君主制§!已实施，将无法更改继承法

original: §YPowerful Vassals§! can be fired from the §YCouncil§!\nDisables the §YElective Monarchy§! law for Indian and Muslim religions\nCan now change succession if §YElective Monarchy§! is instituted
translation: §Y强力的封臣§!可以从§Y内阁§!被开除\n印度宗教和穆斯林禁用§Y选举君主制§!\n可以更改继承法即使§Y选举君主制§!已实施

original: Both parties must allow matrilineal marriage
translation: 两方必须都允许入赘婚姻

original: Vice Royalties are not allowed to change primary title
translation: 总督不被允许更改主头衔

original: Are you sure you want to abandon the game?
translation: 你确定你要放弃游戏吗？
内阁必须处于满意状态

original: Councillors cannot join or start §YFactions§! while the council is §YContent§! and the §YWar Declaration§! law is set to §YCouncil§! (Nomadic and Tribal councillors can always join and start factions).\nThe liege cannot §YEnforce Realm Peace§! while the council is §YDiscontent§!.
translation: 在内阁处于§Y满意§!状态并且§Y宣战§!法被设定为§Y内阁§!的时候，内阁成员将无法加入或者组织§Y派系§!（游牧和部落的内阁成员无论何时都可加入或者组织派系）。\n在内阁处于 §Y不满§! 状态的时候，领主无法§Y强制领内和平§!。

original: Your Council has been Discontent for $DISCONTENT_DURATION|Y$ month(s), and will be until §Y$DISCONTENT_END_DATE$§!. This means that if Councillors were prohibited by law from forming and joining factions, they may now do so. This could potentially destabilize the realm.
translation: 您的内阁已经处于不满状态长达 $DISCONTENT_DURATION|Y$ 个月，并将持续到 §Y$DISCONTENT_END_DATE$§!。这意味着如果有内阁成员曾经因法律被禁止创建跟加入派系，那么他们现在可以这么做。这将很可能会动摇国本。

original: Your Liege's Council has been Discontent for $DISCONTENT_DURATION$ month(s), and will be until §Y$DISCONTENT_END_DATE$§!. This means that if Councillors were prohibited by law from forming and joining Factions, they may now do so. This could potentially destabilize the realm.
translation: 您领主的内阁已经处于不满状态长达 $DISCONTENT_DURATION$ 个月，并将持续到 §Y$DISCONTENT_END_DATE$§!。这意味着如果有内阁成员曾经因法律被禁止创建跟加入派系，那么他们现在可以这么做。这将很可能会动摇国本。

original: Is close enough to threaten us
translation: 对我们的威胁近在眼前

original: Is the target of one or more §YDefensive Pacts§! with a total of $NUM_MEMBERS|Y$ members.
translation: 是一个或多个§Y共同防御协定§!的针对目标，总共有$NUM_MEMBERS|Y$位成员。

original: Is in a §YDefensive Pact§! against $TARGET|Y$. A total of $NUM_MEMBERS|Y$ characters have joined §YDefensive Pacts§! against the same target.
translation: 处于针对$TARGET|Y$的§Y共同防御协定§!中。总共$NUM_MEMBERS|Y$角色已加入§Y共同防御协定§!以对抗同一目标。

original:
Effects of §YThreat§!:

- With over $COALITION_INFAMY_LIMIT|%Y0$ §YThreat§! other realms can form §YDefensive Pacts§! to protect themselves from you. Each religious group has their own separate §YDefensive Pact§! and will only defend members belonging to that same §YDefensive Pact§!.

- With over $OTHER_COALITION_JOIN_INFAMY|%Y0$ §YThreat§! all §YDefensive Pacts§! of other religious groups band together if you attack one of them.

- With over $EVERY_COALITION_EXCEPT_HEADS_JOIN_INFAMY|%Y0$ §YThreat§! all §YDefensive Pacts§! including that of your own religious group will band together if you attack one of them.

- With over $EVERY_COALITION_JOIN_INFAMY|%Y0$ §YThreat§! you are considered threatening enough that even your own religious head and holy orders from your religious group will defend other §YDefensive Pacts§! from you.

- As your §YThreat§! increases, larger and more distant realms are allowed to join the §YDefensive Pacts§! opposing you.

- As your §YThreat§! decreases, larger or more distant realms are forced to leave the §YDefensive Pacts§! opposing you.

--------------
§YThreat§! will decline slowly over time but you can manually lower it by granting independence to land not part of your De Jure realm.
translation:
§Y威胁度§!效果：

- 当§Y威胁度§!超过 $COALITION_INFAMY_LIMIT|%Y0$ 时，其他领主会签订§Y共同防御协定§!来保护自己。每个宗教组有各自分开的§Y共同防御协定§!且只会保卫来自相同§Y共同防御协定§!的成员。

- 当§Y威胁度§!超过 $OTHER_COALITION_JOIN_INFAMY|%Y0$ 时，所有来自其他宗教组的§Y共同防御协定§!成员将会在您进攻某个成员时集体反击。

- 当§Y威胁度§!超过 $EVERY_COALITION_EXCEPT_HEADS_JOIN_INFAMY|%Y0$ 时，包括您自己宗教组在内的所有§Y共同防御协定§!成员都会在您发动进攻某个成员时集体反击。

- 当§Y威胁度§!超过 $EVERY_COALITION_JOIN_INFAMY|%Y0$ 时，你将被认为臭名昭著，连你自己的宗教首领和本宗教的骑士团都会主动加入针对你的§Y共同防御协定§!。

- 随着你§Y威胁度§!的提升，更大或者更遥远的国度将被允许加入针对你的§Y共同防御协定§!。

- 当你的§Y威胁度§!下降时，更大或者更遥远的国度将被强制离开针对你的§Y共同防御协定§!。

--------------
§Y威胁度§!随着时间会缓慢下降，但是你可以通过给予非法理领地独立手动降低威胁度。

original: §Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§! can be at most $RATIO|Y%0$ the size of §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!
I don't want to be imprisoned

Council Elective is a special form of succession that can only be enabled by enacting certain laws. The ruler and each council member can nominate a successor from among the direct vassals and legitimate children and siblings of the ruler. All council members have a vote, regardless if they are landed or not. In this form of elective succession there are no elector titles, instead the ruler and the council members each get one vote. Council Elective Succession is very popular with the vassals.
translation: 内阁选举法是一种独特的继承法，仅可通过颁布特定法律而实现。领主和每名内阁成员均可从直属封臣、婚生子女、以及领主的配偶中选择并提名一位继承人。每位内阁成员拥有一票，不管他们是否拥有领地。这种选举继承法将不考虑投票者的头衔，无论领主还是内阁成员每人都只有一票。内阁选举法非常受封臣的欢迎。

original: §RAs you are on the Council and the Council gets to vote on War Declarations, you can only create or join factions while the Council is Discontent.§!
translation: §R你是内阁成员并且内阁投票决定宣战与否，你只能在内阁不满的时候创建或者加入派系。§!

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledName] has decided to abandon nomadic life and settle down in [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetName] with [FromFrom.GetHerHis] followers, making it a new homeland for the [FromFrom.Culture.GetName] people.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledName]已经决定放弃游牧生活并和[FromFrom.GetHerHis]追随者们定居在[FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetName]，使之成为[FromFrom.Culture.GetName]人的新家园。

original: A Malcontent councillor is unhappy with the current state of affairs in the realm. They are a troublesome force on the council and will always oppose the will of the ruler unless they directly stand to gain power.
translation: 反对派的内阁成员对国事现状会非常不满。他们是内阁中的麻烦，除非立即能够获得权力，否则他们会一直反对领主的意愿。

original: A Zealot councillor will strive towards bringing religion to the forefront of the realm's political agenda. If religious war targets are available this councillor might oppose wars against other targets. The councillor will also be more inclined to accept hostile action against heathen and heretic characters.
translation: 宗教狂热的内阁成员会努力把宗教事务摆在领内政治议程的优先项。如果存在宗教战争的目标，这位内阁成员将反对对其他目标开战。这位内阁成员也会更倾向于支持对异端和异教角色敌对的行为。

original: This character has been cursed with a weak physique.
This character has developed a sharp and astute mind.
translation: 此角色发展出了敏锐精明的心智。

original: This character isn't the sharpest knife in the drawer.
